DOC.brief_title: AP-003-B Study Evaluate Efficacy And Safety Of An Intra-Articular Injection Of Ampion™ In Adults With Pain With Osteoarthritis Of The Knee
DOC.detailed_description: A Randomized , Placebo-Controlled , Double-Blind Study To Evaluate The Efficacy And Safety Of An Intra-Articular Injection Of AMPION™ In Adults With Pain Due Osteoarthritis Of The Knee The primary trial objective evaluate efficacy 4 mL AMPION™ versus 4 mL placebo intra-articular ( IA ) injection improve knee pain , administer subject suffer OA knee . The secondary trial objective evaluation safety intra-articular injection AMPION™ .
